ui.createFirstCategory: Create your first custom category above to organize items your way!
ui.predefinedDescription: These built-in categories are available in all lists and cannot be modified.
ui.viewOnlyDescription: You have view-only access. Only owners and editors can create, edit, or delete custom categories.

errors.tooLong: Category name must be 100 characters or less
errors.predefinedName: Cannot use predefined category names (Produce, Dairy, Meat, Bakery, Pantry, Frozen, Beverages, Other)
errors.alreadyExists: A category with this name already exists
errors.invalidColor: Color must be a valid hex code (e.g., #FF5733 or #F53)
errors.invalidIcon: Icon must be between 1 and 10 characters
errors.failedToAdd: Failed to add category. Please try again.
errors.failedToUpdate: Failed to update category. Please try again.
errors.failedToDelete: Failed to delete category. Please try again.
errors.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one category
errors.targetCannotBeSelected: Target category cannot be one of the selected categories

help.categoryNameHelp: Choose a descriptive name for your category (e.g., Spices, Snacks, Cleaning)
help.colorHelp: Pick a color to help visually identify this category
help.iconHelp: Add an emoji or icon to make your category stand out
help.customCategoriesHelp: Custom categories are specific to this list. Use them to organize items beyond the built-in categories.

confirmations.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
confirmations.deleteWarning: Items using this category will still be visible, but the category will no longer be available for new items.
confirmations.bulkDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected {categories}?
confirmations.bulkDeleteWarning: Items using these categories will still be visible, but the categories will no longer be available for new items.
confirmations.mergeMessage: Select a target category to merge {count} selected {categories} into:
confirmations.mergeWarning: All items from the selected categories will be moved to the target category, and the selected categories will be deleted.
confirmations.changeColorMessage: Choose a color to apply to {count} selected {categories}:
